summary: HR Senior Specialist with extensive experience in health insurance/retirement benefits administration and high-volume customer service. Skilled in MS Office (Excel, Outlook, Access), data entry, and process improvement; proven ability to manage pension calculations, explain Medicare/Medicaid coverage, and mentor staff.

experience.title: HR Senior Specialist
experience.description: Provide administrative support relating to personnel, retirement benefits and special projects. Assist participants with Medicare/Medicaid questions and eligibility; explain health and insurance coverage; keep up to date with changes in health and insurance coverage. Responsible for processing and calculating retirees' pension. Educate participants on retirement plan benefits. Handle inbound and outbound calls; support team meetings by preparing issues, taking minutes. Work on special projects including corrections of payment setups, tax forms (1099-R) requests, and pension calculations; educate retirees on payment options and changes in their coverage. Mentored team members on phone etiquette and quality monitoring.

experience.title: Member and Claims Representative
experience.description: Provided support for the bilingual unit during supervisor's absence; assisted and guided new bilingual hires. Facilitated care coordination for Medicaid members with critical care needs; established and maintained positive relations with Amerigroup network providers. Participated in special projects for the Director of the Customer Service Department and assisted in administrative duties during absences.

experience.title: Executive Secretary Assistant
experience.description: Reported to call center Directors and an executive (VP/GM); performed advanced, diversified, confidential secretarial and administrative duties. Wrote and routed confidential correspondence; screened calls and maintained confidential files; coordinated travel and prepared expense reports; compiled meeting minutes; created and maintained databases; coached new hires; supported escalated line and addressed member concerns.

experience.title: Administrative Secretary
experience.description: Provided administrative support to the center manager for inbound/outbound units and the training department; managed incoming correspondence, scheduled conferences, travel arrangements, and training materials; prepared expense reports; managed attendance and personnel records; conducted bilingual telephone interviews; supported multiple customer service teams.

experience.title: Executive Complaint Professional
experience.description: Served as a consumer advocate to the CEO; liaison with government agencies such as the Better Business Bureau and Attorney General offices. Resolved customer complaints by phone and correspondence; maintained contact with regional directors to obtain results; reported complaints to the CEO and tracked open/closed cases and escalations.

education.degree: Associate of Applied Science in Secretarial Science
